EmailTemplate.name: 07 - Trial & Verification 2H 2018.07b - Trial & Verification
EmailTemplate.subject: Trial Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Pivotal Labs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
At Pivotal, our contagious culture and innovative products are transforming the way software is built and delivered. Hear from the analysts, meet with our experts or trial the software to see the value for yourself:
Forrester Report - The Total Economic Impact™ of Pivotal Cloud Foundry: In this report Forrester Consulting conducted a Total Economic Impact™ (TEI) study that examined the potential ROI of Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF), including both quantifiable and qualifiable results: https://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/the-total-economic-impact-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry.pdf
Pivotal Labs Consultation: A free, intensive, one-hour consultation with a balanced team from Pivotal (designer, engineer and product manager). Contact Antoine at alefevre@pivotal.io to book your consultation.
Product Download: Visit the Pivotal Network to download the latest version of our PCF and data solutions, learn more about the suite of tools and access support documentation: https://network.pivotal.io/
I trust these insights will help you make transformation real for your organisation.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
